full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP)

COURSE OVERVIEW: The Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP) course is a prestigious training program in cloud security offered by Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber. The program is officially recognized by ISC2 in Israel and aims to provide participants with advanced knowledge and skills in cloud security.

TARGET AUDIENCE: This course is designed for professionals with at least 5 years of experience in information technologies who are looking to specialize in cloud security.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: The course is organized and managed by Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber, which specializes in dedicated programs and is an official academy of ISC2 in Israel.

PREREQUISITES: Participants must have at least 5 years of experience in information technologies and must complete a consultation with an academic advisor.

CERTIFICATIONS: Certified Cloud Security Professional (CCSP).

COURSE SCHEDULE:
- Start Date: 17.02.2025.
- Duration: 9 sessions.
- Academic Hours: 45 hours.
- Schedule: Mondays from 17:30 to 21:30 and Fridays from 09:00 to 13:00.

LEARNING FORMAT:
- Hybrid learning format.
- Classes will be held at Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan and via Zoom, based on participants' preference.

TUITION AND FEES: Not specified in the text.

COURSE TOPICS:
- Cloud Concepts, Architecture, and Design: This topic covers the foundational concepts of cloud computing, including architecture and design principles.
- Cloud Data Security: Participants will learn about securing data in cloud environments, including encryption and data protection strategies.
- Cloud Platform and Infrastructure Security: This section focuses on securing cloud platforms and infrastructure, including virtualization and network security.
- Cloud Application Security: This topic addresses the security of applications hosted in the cloud, including secure development practices.
- Cloud Security Operations: Participants will explore operational aspects of cloud security, including monitoring and incident response.
- Legal, Risk, and Compliance: This section covers the legal and regulatory aspects of cloud security, as well as risk management and compliance requirements.

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION:
- To schedule an admission interview and register, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or via email at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University's School of High-Tech and Cyber is a leading institution in Israel, offering specialized programs in technology and cybersecurity. It is an official academy of ISC2, providing high-quality training and certifications in the field of cloud security.
